#3.1
Fast Track
Select the skill(s) you want to learn.  This lesson will include ONLY the skills that you select.  

You want to be able to:
    About the Static Analyzer
    Queries
    Making a Query
    Looking at Results in Text View
    Looking at Results in Call tree View
    Examining Source Code Accessed from the Static Analyzer
    Finding out Where a Variable is Used 
    Building a Static Analyzer Database
    Changing a File From Scanner Mode to Parser Mode
    Rebuilding the Database
    A Porting Example
    Advantages of Parser Mode
    For More Information on the Static Analyzer...

Are you finished selecting?
